youtube-viewer.description: A really simple YouTube viewer built using React. The user can enter a search term and get a handful of matching video results. I tried to replicate the general style of YouTube and make it responsive. I'm thinking about creating a more fully featured clone of YouTube in the future!
youtube-viewer.tech: HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, React, YouTube API, Jest and Enzyme (for testing).
